wikiDescription: Use /spawn to instantly teleport to the server's spawn area. Great for regrouping with friends or escaping dangerous situations quickly.
Mark your base or safe zone with /sethome and return anytime using /home. Exclusive to players with linked Discord accounts.
Quickly travel to other players by sending teleport requests with /tpa and accepting them with /tpaccept. Perfect for teaming up or visiting friends.
Send private messages to other players using /msg. Only you and the recipient can see the conversation, ensuring secure communication.
Use /back to teleport to your last location after teleporting or dying (if permitted by the server). Great for retracing your steps.
Transfer money to another player using /pay for trading items or helping out friends. Supports the server's economy system.
Connect your Minecraft and Discord accounts via DiscordSRV using /discord link. Enter the code from the #link channel on Discord to unlock synced roles and chat integration.

AuraSkills provides an engaging RPG skill system for Minecraft servers. Level up 11 default skills like Mining, Combat, Farming, Woodcutting, Fishing, Enchanting, and more by earning skill XP through actions like breaking blocks, fighting mobs, or harvesting crops. Check XP sources for each skill via the XP bottle in the skill road GUI. Every level brings new rewards, boosting stats like health, damage, or luck, and unlocking up to 5 passive abilities at levels 1, 5, 10, 15, and 20. These abilities, such as increased drop rates or faster resource gathering, enhance gameplay. Earn skill points as you level up to unlock or upgrade abilities in customizable skill trees. Use /skills to open the interactive GUI to track progress, view stats, and manage abilities, or /skill to see detailed information on a skillâ€™s abilities, XP requirements, and upgrades.

The Rogue Wanderer is a unique NPC that players hunt. Defeat it three times to earn a Beam Stone. Receive a new hint after each defeat, with hints updated daily at 15:00. Check Discord for notifications. As you get closer, additional hints help guide your hunt.
